scripts.build: npm run build:html & npm run build:lite
scripts.build:lite: ./node_modules/.bin/resume export resume.html -r dist/resume-lite.json -t jsonresume-theme-onepage-plus; ./node_modules/.bin/puppeteer --wait-until networkidle0  --margin-top 40px --margin-right 40px --margin-bottom 40px --margin-left 40px --format letter print resume.html dist/resume.pdf; rm resume.html
